snippet: Even though polls have shown little desire among voters for Eliot Spitzer to return to public office, he is ready to ask for forgiveness and to make the case why he is again qualified to serve.
abstract: Even though polls have shown little desire among voters for Eliot Spitzer to return to public office, he is ready to ask for forgiveness and to make the case why he is again qualified to serve.

headline.main: Spitzer Opens Up About His Decision to Return to Politics
